languages.text: {n}Капитан разводит руками.{/n} "Мы стеснены в ресурсах, Ваша Светлость. Провизия, лекарства, топливо — все это уходит в отсеки с более... ценными членами экипажа".

{n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."
languages.original_text: {n}Капитан разводит руками.{/n} "Мы стеснены в ресурсах, Ваша Светлость. Провизия, лекарства, топливо — все это уходит в отсеки с более... ценными членами экипажа".

languages.text: {n}Der Captain wirft seine Hände in die Luft.{/n} "Wir haben kaum Ressourcen, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Rationen, Medikamente und Treibstoff gehen an die Module mit ... wertvolleren Crewmitgliedern."
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Captain wirft seine Hände in die Luft.{/n} "Wir haben kaum Ressourcen, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Rationen, Medikamente und Treibstoff gehen an die Module mit ... wertvolleren Crewmitgliedern."

languages.text: {n}Le capitaine lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « Nous manquons cruellement de ressources, Votre Seigneurie. Provisions, médicaments et carburant sont détournés vers des baies abritant des membres d'équipage... plus importants. »
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le capitaine lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « Nous manquons cruellement de ressources, Votre Seigneurie. Provisions, médicaments et carburant sont détournés vers des baies abritant des membres d'équipage... plus importants. »

languages.text: {n}El capitán levanta las manos, exasperado.{/n} «Andamos cortos de recursos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las provisiones, medicinas y combustible se desvían a otros compartimentos habitados por miembros de la tripulación más... valiosos».
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capitán levanta las manos, exasperado.{/n} «Andamos cortos de recursos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las provisiones, medicinas y combustible se desvían a otros compartimentos habitados por miembros de la tripulación más... valiosos».

languages.text: {n}中隊長が両手を上げる。{/n}「ここは資源に乏しいのです、陛下。食料、衣料品、燃料はすべて、もっと…価値のあるクルーを収容しているベイに集められているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."

traits.locale_text: {n}中隊長が両手を上げる。{/n}「ここは資源に乏しいのです、陛下。食料、衣料品、燃料はすべて、もっと…価値のあるクルーを収容しているベイに集められているのです」

languages.text: {n}上尉举起了双手。{/n}“我们的资源非常紧张，大人。大部分粮食、药品与燃料都被送到了其他甲板，那里住着更多……有价值的船员。”
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."

traits.locale_text: {n}上尉举起了双手。{/n}“我们的资源非常紧张，大人。大部分粮食、药品与燃料都被送到了其他甲板，那里住着更多……有价值的船员。”

languages.text: {n}Komutan, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Kaynaklar hususunda çok zor durumdayız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tüm erzak, ilaç ve yakıtlar... Daha kıymetli mürettebat barındıran bölmelere aktarılıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The captain throws up his hands.{/n} "We are hard-pressed for resources, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Provisions, medicine, and fuel are all being funnelled to bays that house more... valuable crew members."
